A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: wow\, just wow! such a different story than what I was anticipating. crazy how much had changed Luke's life. I loved the character development overall. the amount of action and all the stories left me exhausted. I had to see out twice just too absorb it all a fully embrace the storylines. the gambling planet story needed work and the chase left a little to be desired but it was a great addition. too bad we won't see the original stories with Leia.
